anya-e0101n2:7_0: 23. Tattha atthatoti tāva rathikasusānasaṅkārakūṭādīnaṁ yattha katthaci paṁsūnaṁ

anya-e0101n2:7_2: viya kucchitabhāvaṁ ulatīti paṁsukūlaṁ, kucchitabhāvaṁ gacchatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Evaṁ

anya-e0101n2:8: Eteneva nayena saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhātaṁ ticīvaraṁ sīlamassāti tecīvariko. Tecīvarikassa aṅgaṁ tecīvarikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:9_0: Bhikkhāsaṅkhātānaṁ pana āmisapiṇḍānaṁ pātoti piṇḍapāto, parehi dinnānaṁ piṇḍānaṁ
anya-e0101n2:9_1: patte nipatananti vuttaṁ hoti. Taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ uñchati taṁ taṁ kulaṁ upasaṅkamanto
anya-e0101n2:9_2: gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko. Piṇḍāya vā patituṁ vatametassāti piṇḍapātī, patitunti carituṁ,
anya-e0101n2:9_3: piṇḍapātī eva piṇḍapātiko. Piṇḍapātikassa aṅgaṁ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:10_0: Dānaṁ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṁ, apetaṁ dānatoti apadānaṁ, anavakhaṇḍananti attho. Saha
anya-e0101n2:10_1: apadānena sapadānaṁ, avakhaṇḍanarahitaṁ anugharanti vuttaṁ hoti. Sapadānaṁ carituṁ
anya-e0101n2:10_2: idamassa sīlanti sapadānacārī, sapadānacārī eva sapadānacāriko. Tassa aṅgaṁ sapadānacārikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:11: Ekāsane bhojanaṁ ekāsanaṁ, taṁ sīlamassāti ekāsaniko. Tassa aṅgaṁ ekāsanikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:12_0: Dutiyabhājanassa paṭikkhittattā kevalaṁ ekasmiṁyeva patte piṇḍo pattapiṇḍo. Idāni
anya-e0101n2:12_1: pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṁ katvā pattapiṇḍo sīlamassāti pattapiṇḍiko. Tassa
anya-e0101n2:13_0: Khalūti paṭisedhanatthe nipāto. Pavāritena satā pacchā laddhaṁ bhattaṁ pacchābhattaṁ
anya-e0101n2:13_1: nāma, tassa pacchābhattassa bhojanaṁ pacchābhattabhojanaṁ, tasmiṁ pacchābhattabhojane
anya-e0101n2:13_2: pacchābhattasaññaṁ katvā pacchābhattaṁ sīlamassāti pacchābhattiko. Na pacchābhattiko
anya-e0101n2:13_4: pana vuttaṁ khalūti eko sakuṇo. So mukhena phalaṁ gahetvā tasmiṁ patite puna aññaṁ
anya-e0101n2:13_5: na khādati. Tādiso ayanti khalupacchābhattiko. Tassa aṅgaṁ khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:14: Araññe nivāso sīlamassāti āraññiko. Tassa aṅgaṁ āraññikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:15: Rukkhamūle nivāso rukkhamūlaṁ, taṁ sīlamassāti rukkhamūliko. Rukkhamūlikassa aṅgaṁ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṁ. Abbhokāsikasosānikaṅgesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0101n2:16_0: Yadeva santhataṁ yathāsanthataṁ, idaṁ tuyhaṁ pāpuṇātīti evaṁ paṭhamaṁ uddiṭṭhasenāsanassetaṁ
anya-e0101n2:16_1: adhivacanaṁ. Tasmiṁ yathāsanthate viharituṁ sīlamassāti yathāsanthatiko. Tassa aṅgaṁ
anya-e0101n2:17: Sayanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharituṁ sīlamassāti nesajjiko. Tassa aṅgaṁ nesajjikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:18_0: Sabbāneva panetāni tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
anya-e0101n2:18_1: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṁ ñāṇaṁ aṅgaṁ etesanti dhutaṅgāni. Atha vā
anya-e0101n2:18_2: dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgāni. Evaṁ
anya-e0101n2:19_0: Sabbāneva panetāni samādānacetanālakkhaṇāni. Vuttampi cetaṁ ‘‘yo samādiyati, so puggalo.
anya-e0101n2:19_1: Yena samādiyati, cittacetasikā ete dhammā. Yā samādānacetanā, taṁ dhutaṅgaṁ. Yaṁ
anya-e0101n2:19_2: paṭikkhipati, taṁ vatthū’’ti. Sabbāneva ca loluppaviddhaṁsanarasāni, nilloluppabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāni
anya-e0101n2:20_0: Samādānavidhānatotiādīsu pana pañcasu sabbāneva dhutaṅgāni dharamāne bhagavati bhagavatova
anya-e0101n2:20_1: santike samādātabbāni. Parinibbute mahāsāvakassa santike. Tasmiṁ asati khīṇāsavassa,
anya-e0101n2:20_2: anāgāmissa, sakadāgāmissa, sotāpannassa, tipiṭakassa, dvipiṭakassa, ekapiṭakassa,
anya-e0101n2:20_3: ekasaṅgītikassa, aṭṭhakathācariyassa. Tasmiṁ asati dhutaṅgadharassa, tasmimpi asati
anya-e0101n2:20_4: cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ sammajjitvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā sammāsambuddhassa santike vadantena
anya-e0101n2:20_5: viya samādātabbāni, apica sayampi samādātuṁ vaṭṭati eva. Ettha ca cetiyapabbate dve
anya-e0101n2:20_6: bhātikattherānaṁ jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthu kathetabbaṁ. Ayaṁ tāva sādhāraṇakathā.
anya-e0101n2:22_1: tāva ‘‘gahapatidānacīvaraṁ paṭikkhipāmi, paṁsukūlikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesu dvīsu
anya-e0101n2:22_2: vacanesu aññatarena samādinnaṁ hoti. Idaṁ tāvettha samādānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:23_0: Evaṁ samādinnadhutaṅgena pana tena sosānikaṁ, pāpaṇikaṁ, rathiyacoḷaṁ, saṅkāracoḷaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:23_1: sotthiyaṁ, nhānacoḷaṁ, titthacoḷaṁ, gatapaccāgataṁ, aggiḍaḍḍhaṁ, gokhāyitaṁ, upacikākhāyitaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:23_2: undūrakhāyitaṁ, antacchinnaṁ, dasācchinnaṁ, dhajāhaṭaṁ, thūpacīvaraṁ, samaṇacīvaraṁ,
anya-e0101n2:23_3: ābhisekikaṁ, iddhimayaṁ, panthikaṁ, vātāhaṭaṁ, devadattiyaṁ, sāmuddiyantietesu aññataraṁ
anya-e0101n2:23_4: cīvaraṁ gahetvā phāletvā dubbalaṭṭhānaṁ pahāya thiraṭṭhānāni dhovitvā cīvaraṁ katvā
anya-e0101n2:24_0: Tattha sosānikanti susāne patitakaṁ. Pāpaṇikanti āpaṇadvāre patitakaṁ. Rathiyacoḷanti
anya-e0101n2:24_1: puññatthikehi vātapānantarena rathikāya chaḍḍitacoḷakaṁ. Saṅkāracoḷanti saṅkāraṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n2:24_2: chaḍḍitacoḷakaṁ. Sotthiyanti gabbhamalaṁ puñchitvā chaḍḍitavatthaṁ. Tissāmaccamātā
anya-e0101n2:24_3: kira satagghanakena vatthena gabbhamalaṁ puñchāpetvā paṁsukūlikā gaṇhissantīti tālaveḷimagge
anya-e0101n2:24_4: chaḍḍāpesi. Bhikkhū jiṇṇakaṭṭhānatthameva gaṇhanti. Nhānacoḷanti yaṁ bhūtavejjehi
anya-e0101n2:25_0: Titthacoḷanti nhānatitthe chaḍḍitapilotikā. Gatapaccāgatanti yaṁ manussā susānaṁ
anya-e0101n2:25_1: gantvā paccāgatā nhatvā chaḍḍenti. Aggiḍaḍḍhanti agginā ḍaḍḍhappadesaṁ. Tañhi manussā
anya-e0101n2:25_2: chaḍḍenti. Gokhāyitādīni pākaṭāneva. Tādisānipi hi manussā chaḍḍenti. Dhajāhaṭanti
anya-e0101n2:25_3: nāvaṁ ārohantā dhajaṁ bandhitvā ārūhanti. Taṁ tesaṁ dassanātikkame gahetuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:25_4: Yampi yuddhabhūmiyaṁ dhajaṁ bandhitvā ṭhapitaṁ, taṁ dvinnampi senānaṁ gatakāle gahetuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:26_0: Thūpacīvaranti vammikaṁ parikkhipitvā balikammaṁ kataṁ. Samaṇacīvaranti bhikkhusantakaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:26_1: Ābhisekikanti rañño abhisekaṭṭhāne chaḍḍitacīvaraṁ. Iddhimayanti ehibhikkhucīvaraṁ.
anya-e0101n2:26_2: Panthikanti antarāmagge patitakaṁ. Yaṁ pana sāmikānaṁ satisammosena patitaṁ, taṁ
anya-e0101n2:26_3: thokaṁ rakkhitvā gahetabbaṁ. Vātāhaṭanti vātena paharitvā dūre pātitaṁ, taṁ pana
anya-e0101n2:26_4: sāmike apassantena gahetuṁ vaṭṭati. Devadattiyanti anuruddhattherassa viya devatāhi
anya-e0101n2:27_0: Yaṁ pana saṅghassa demāti dinnaṁ, coḷakabhikkhāya vā caramānehi laddhaṁ, na taṁ paṁsukūlaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:27_1: Bhikkhudattiyepi yaṁ vassaggena gāhetvā vā dīyati, senāsanacīvaraṁ vā hoti, na taṁ
anya-e0101n2:27_2: paṁsukūlaṁ. No gāhāpetvā dinnameva paṁsukūlaṁ. Tatrapi yaṁ dāyakehi bhikkhussa pādamūle
anya-e0101n2:27_3: nikkhittaṁ, tena pana bhikkhunā paṁsukūlikassa hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnaṁ, taṁ ekatosuddhikaṁ
anya-e0101n2:27_4: nāma. Yaṁ bhikkhuno hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnaṁ, tena pana pādamūle ṭhapitaṁ, tampi ekatosuddhikaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:27_5: Yaṁ bhikkhunopi pādamūle ṭhapitaṁ, tenāpi tatheva dinnaṁ, taṁ ubhatosuddhikaṁ. Yaṁ
anya-e0101n2:27_6: hatthe ṭhapetvā laddhaṁ, hattheyeva ṭhapitaṁ, taṁ anukkaṭṭhacīvaraṁ nāma. Iti imaṁ
anya-e0101n2:27_7: paṁsukūlabhedaṁ ñatvā paṁsukūlikena cīvaraṁ paribhuñjitabbanti idamettha vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:28_0: Ayaṁ pana pabhedo, tayo paṁsukūlikā ukkaṭṭho majjhimo mudūti. Tattha sosānikaṁyeva
anya-e0101n2:28_1: gaṇhanto ukkaṭṭho hoti. Pabbajitā gaṇhissantīti ṭhapitakaṁ gaṇhanto majjhimo. Pādamūle
anya-e0101n2:29: Tesu yassa kassaci attano ruciyā gihidinnakaṁ sāditakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:30_2: aparāyattavuttitā, corabhayena abhayatā, paribhogataṇhāya abhāvo, samaṇasāruppaparikkhāratā,
anya-e0101n2:30_3: ‘‘appāni ceva sulabhāni ca tāni ca anavajjānī’’ti (a. ni. 4.27; itivu. 101) bhagavatā
anya-e0101n2:34: Yaṁ lokagarunā ko taṁ, paṁsukūlaṁ na dhāraye.
anya-e0101n2:35: Tasmā hi attano bhikkhu, paṭiññaṁ samanussaraṁ;
anya-e0101n2:39: 25. Tadanantaraṁ pana tecīvarikaṅgaṁ ‘‘catutthakacīvaraṁ paṭikkhipāmi, tecīvarikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:40_0: Tena pana tecīvarikena cīvaradussaṁ labhitvā yāva aphāsukabhāvena kātuṁ vā na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n2:40_1: vicārakaṁ vā na labhati, sūciādīsu vāssa kiñci na sampajjati, tāva nikkhipitabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:40_2: Nikkhittapaccayā doso natthi. Rajitakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikkhipituṁ na vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n2:41_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhena rajanakāle paṭhamaṁ antaravāsakaṁ
anya-e0101n2:41_1: vā uttarāsaṅgaṁ vā rajitvā taṁ nivāsetvā itaraṁ rajitabbaṁ. Taṁ pārupitvā saṅghāṭi
anya-e0101n2:41_2: rajitabbā. Saṅghāṭiṁ pana nivāsetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Idamassa gāmantasenāsane vattaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:41_3: Āraññake pana dve ekato dhovitvā rajituṁ vaṭṭati. Yathā pana kañci disvā sakkoti
anya-e0101n2:41_4: kāsāvaṁ ākaḍḍhitvā uparikātuṁ, evaṁ āsanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṁ. Majjhimassa rajanasālāyaṁ
anya-e0101n2:41_5: rajanakāsāvaṁ nāma hoti, taṁ nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā rajanakammaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:41_6: Mudukassa sabhāgabhikkhūnaṁ cīvarāni nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā rajanakammaṁ kātuṁ
anya-e0101n2:41_7: vaṭṭati. Tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇampi tassa vaṭṭati. Pariharituṁ pana na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:41_8: Sabhāgabhikkhūnaṁ cīvarampi antarantarā paribhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati. Dhutaṅgatecīvarikassa
anya-e0101n2:41_9: pana catutthaṁ vattamānaṁ aṁsakāsāvameva vaṭṭati. Tañca kho vitthārato vidatthi,
anya-e0101n2:42: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi catutthakacīvaraṁ sāditakkhaṇeyeva dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.

anya-e0101n2:43_1: pakkhino viya samādāyeva gamanaṁ, appasamārambhatā, vatthasannidhiparivajjanaṁ, sallahukavuttitā,
anya-e0101n2:50: 26.Piṇḍapātikaṅgampi ‘‘atirekalābhaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, piṇḍapātikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:51_0: Tena pana piṇḍapātikena ‘‘saṅghabhattaṁ, uddesabhattaṁ, nimantanabhattaṁ, salākabhattaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:51_1: pakkhikaṁ, uposathikaṁ, pāṭipadikaṁ, āgantukabhattaṁ, gamikabhattaṁ, gilānabhattaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:51_2: gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṁ, vihārabhattaṁ, dhurabhattaṁ, vārakabhatta’’nti etāni cuddasa
anya-e0101n2:51_3: bhattāni na sāditabbāni. Sace pana ‘‘saṅghabhattaṁ gaṇhathā’’tiādinā nayena avatvā
anya-e0101n2:51_4: ‘‘amhākaṁ gehe saṅgho bhikkhaṁ gaṇhātu, tumhepi bhikkhaṁ gaṇhathā’’ti vatvā dinnāni
anya-e0101n2:51_5: honti, tāni sādituṁ vaṭṭanti. Saṅghato nirāmisasalākāpi vihāre pakkabhattampi vaṭṭatiyevāti idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:52_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho puratopi pacchatopi āhaṭabhikkhaṁ
anya-e0101n2:52_1: gaṇhati, pattadvāre ṭhatvā pattaṁ gaṇhantānampi deti, paṭikkamanaṁ āharitvā dinnabhikkhampi
anya-e0101n2:52_2: gaṇhati, taṁ divasaṁ pana nisīditvā bhikkhaṁ na gaṇhati. Majjhimo taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvāpi
anya-e0101n2:52_3: gaṇhati, svātanāya pana nādhivāseti. Mudukosvātanāyapi punadivasāyapi bhikkhaṁ adhivāseti.
anya-e0101n2:52_4: Te ubhopi serivihārasukhaṁ na labhanti, ukkaṭṭhova labhati. Ekasmiṁ kira gāme ariyavaṁso
anya-e0101n2:52_5: hoti, ukkaṭṭho itare āha – ‘‘āyāmāvuso, dhammasavanāyā’’ti. Tesu eko ekenamhi, bhante,
anya-e0101n2:52_6: manussena nisīdāpitoti āha. Aparo mayā, bhante, svātanāya ekassa bhikkhā adhivāsitāti.
anya-e0101n2:52_7: Evaṁ te ubho parihīnā. Itaro pātova piṇḍāya caritvā gantvā dhammarasaṁ paṭisaṁvedesi.
anya-e0101n2:53: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi saṅghabhattādiatirekalābhaṁ sāditakkhaṇeva dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:54_0: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, ‘‘piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṁ nissāya pabbajjā’’ti (a. ni. 4.27; itivu.
anya-e0101n2:54_1: 101) vacanato nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvo, dutiye ariyavaṁse patiṭṭhānaṁ, aparāyattavuttitā,

anya-e0101n2:66: 27.Sapadānacārikaṅgampi ‘‘loluppacāraṁ paṭikkhipāmi, sapadānacārikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:67_0: Tena pana sapadānacārikena gāmadvāre ṭhatvā parissayābhāvo sallakkhetabbo. Yassā
anya-e0101n2:67_1: racchāya vā gāme vā parissayo hoti, taṁ pahāya aññattha carituṁ vaṭṭati. Yasmiṁ gharadvāre
anya-e0101n2:67_2: vā racchāya vā gāme vā kiñci na labhati, agāmasaññaṁ katvā gantabbaṁ. Yattha kiñci
anya-e0101n2:67_3: labhati, taṁ pahāya gantuṁ na vaṭṭati. Iminā ca bhikkhunā kālataraṁ pavisitabbaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:67_4: evañhi aphāsukaṭṭhānaṁ pahāya aññattha gantuṁ sakkhissati. Sace panassa vihāre dānaṁ
anya-e0101n2:67_5: dentā antarāmagge vā āgacchantā manussā pattaṁ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṁ denti vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:67_6: Iminā ca maggaṁ gacchantenāpi bhikkhācāravelāyaṁ sampattagāmaṁ anatikkamitvā caritabbameva.
anya-e0101n2:67_7: Tattha alabhitvā vā thokaṁ labhitvā vā gāmapaṭipāṭiyā caritabbanti idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:68_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho purato āhaṭabhikkhampi pacchato
anya-e0101n2:68_1: āhaṭabhikkhampi paṭikkamanaṁ āharitvā diyyamānampi na gaṇhati, pattadvāre pana pattaṁ
anya-e0101n2:68_2: vissajjeti . Imasmiñhi dhutaṅge mahākassapattherena sadiso nāma natthi. Tassapi pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānameva
anya-e0101n2:68_3: paññāyati. Majjhimo purato vā pacchato vā āhaṭampi paṭikkamanaṁ āhaṭampi gaṇhati,
anya-e0101n2:68_4: pattadvārepi pattaṁ vissajjeti, na pana bhikkhaṁ āgamayamāno nisīdati. Evaṁ so ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikassa
anya-e0101n2:68_5: anulometi. Muduko taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvā āgameti.
anya-e0101n2:69: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi loluppacāre uppannamatte dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:70_0: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, kulesu niccanavakatā, candūpamatā, kulamaccherappahānaṁ, samānukampitā,
anya-e0101n2:70_1: kulūpakādīnavābhāvo, avhānānabhinandanā, abhihārena anatthikatā, appicchatādīnaṁ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n2:81: 28.Ekāsanikaṅgampi ‘‘nānāsanabhojanaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, ekāsanikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:82_0: Tena pana ekāsanikena āsanasālāyaṁ nisīdantena therāsane anisīditvā ‘‘idaṁ mayhaṁ
anya-e0101n2:82_1: pāpuṇissatī’’ti patirūpaṁ āsanaṁ sallakkhetvā nisīditabbaṁ. Sacassa vippakate bhojane
anya-e0101n2:82_2: ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā āgacchati, uṭṭhāya vattaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati. Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero
anya-e0101n2:82_3: panāha ‘‘āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṁ vā, ayañca vippakatabhojano, tasmā vattaṁ karotu,
anya-e0101n2:82_4: bhojanaṁ pana mā bhuñjatū’’ti. Idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:83_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho appaṁ vā hotu bahu vā, yamhi
anya-e0101n2:83_1: bhojane hatthaṁ otāreti, tato aññaṁ gaṇhituṁ na labhati. Sacepi manussā ‘‘therena
anya-e0101n2:83_2: na kiñci bhutta’’nti sappiādīni āharanti, bhesajjatthameva vaṭṭanti, na āhāratthaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:83_3: Majjhimo yāva patte bhattaṁ na khīyati, tāva aññaṁ gaṇhituṁ labhati. Ayañhi bhojanapariyantiko
anya-e0101n2:83_4: nāma hoti. Muduko yāva āsanā na vuṭṭhāti tāva bhuñjituṁ labhati. So hi udakapariyantiko
anya-e0101n2:83_5: vā hoti yāva pattadhovanaṁ na gaṇhāti tāva bhuñjanato, āsanapariyantiko vā yāva na
anya-e0101n2:84: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi nānāsanabhojanaṁ bhuttakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:85: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, appābādhatā, appātaṅkatā, lahuṭṭhānaṁ, balaṁ, phāsuvihāro, anatirittapaccayā anāpatti, rasataṇhāvinodanaṁ appicchatādīnaṁ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n2:96: 29.Pattapiṇḍikaṅgampi ‘‘dutiyakabhājanaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:97_0: Tena pana pattapiṇḍikena yāgupānakāle bhājane ṭhapetvā byañjane laddhe byañjanaṁ
anya-e0101n2:97_1: vā paṭhamaṁ khāditabbaṁ, yāgu vā pātabbā. Sace pana yāguyaṁ pakkhipati, pūtimacchakādimhi
anya-e0101n2:97_2: byañjane pakkhitte yāgu paṭikūlā hoti, appaṭikūlameva ca katvā bhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:97_3: Tasmā tathārūpaṁ byañjanaṁ sandhāya idaṁ vuttaṁ. Yaṁ pana madhusakkarādikaṁ appaṭikūlaṁ
anya-e0101n2:97_4: hoti, taṁ pakkhipitabbaṁ. Gaṇhantena ca pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbaṁ. Āmakasākaṁ hatthena
anya-e0101n2:97_5: gahetvā khādituṁ vaṭṭati. Tathā pana akatvā patteyeva pakkhipitabbaṁ. Dutiyakabhājanassa
anya-e0101n2:97_6: pana paṭikkhittattā aññaṁ rukkhapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭatīti idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:98_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa aññatra ucchukhādanakālā kacavarampi
anya-e0101n2:98_1: chaḍḍetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Odanapiṇḍamacchamaṁsapūvepi bhinditvā khādituṁ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:98_2: Majjhimassa ekena hatthena bhinditvā khādituṁ vaṭṭati, hatthayogī nāmesa. Muduko
anya-e0101n2:98_3: pana pattayogī nāma hoti, tassa yaṁ sakkā hoti patte pakkhipituṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ hatthena
anya-e0101n2:98_4: vā dantehi vā bhinditvā khādituṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n2:99: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi dutiyakabhājanaṁ sāditakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:100: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, nānārasataṇhāvinodanaṁ. Atricchatāya pahānaṁ, āhāre payojanamattadassitā, thālakādipariharaṇakhedābhāvo, avikkhittabhojitā, appicchatādīnaṁ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n2:107: 30.Khalupacchābhattikaṅgampi ‘‘atirittabhojanaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:108: Tena pana khalupacchābhattikena pavāretvā puna bhojanaṁ kappiyaṁ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṁ. Idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:109_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho yasmā paṭhamapiṇḍe pavāraṇā nāma
anya-e0101n2:109_1: natthi, tasmiṁ pana ajjhohariyamāne aññaṁ paṭikkhipato hoti, tasmā evaṁ pavārito
anya-e0101n2:109_2: paṭhamapiṇḍaṁ ajjhoharitvā dutiyapiṇḍaṁ na bhuñjati. Majjhimo yasmiṁ bhojane pavārito,
anya-e0101n2:109_3: tadeva bhuñjati. Muduko pana yāva āsanā na vuṭṭhāti tāva bhuñjati.
anya-e0101n2:110: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi pavāritānaṁ kappiyaṁ kārāpetvā bhuttakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:111: Ayaṁpanānisaṁso, anatirittabhojanāpattiyā dūrabhāvo, odarikattābhāvo, nirāmisasannidhitā, puna pariyesanāya abhāvo, appicchatādīnaṁ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n2:112: Pariyesanāya khedaṁ, na yāti na karoti sannidhiṁ dhīro;
anya-e0101n2:118: 31.Āraññikaṅgampi ‘‘gāmantasenāsanaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, āraññikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:119: Tena pana āraññikena gāmantasenāsanaṁ pahāya araññe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpetabbaṁ. Tattha saddhiṁ upacārena gāmoyeva gāmantasenāsanaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:120: Gāmo nāma yo koci ekakuṭiko vā anekakuṭiko vā parikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā samanusso vā amanusso vā antamaso atirekacātumāsaniviṭṭho yo koci satthopi.
anya-e0101n2:121_0: Gāmūpacāro nāma parikkhittassa gāmassa sace anurādhapurasseva dve indakhīlā honti,
anya-e0101n2:121_1: abbhantarime indakhīle ṭhitassa thāmamajjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto. Tassa lakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0101n2:121_2: yathā taruṇamanussā attano balaṁ dassentā bāhaṁ pasāretvā leḍḍuṁ khipanti, evaṁ khittassa
anya-e0101n2:121_3: leḍḍussa patanaṭṭhānabbhantaranti vinayadharā. Suttantikā pana kākanivāraṇaniyamena
anya-e0101n2:121_4: khittassāti vadanti. Aparikkhittagāme yaṁ sabbapaccantimassa gharassa dvāre ṭhito
anya-e0101n2:121_5: mātugāmo bhājanena udakaṁ chaḍḍeti, tassa patanaṭṭhānaṁ gharūpacāro. Tato vuttanayena
anya-e0101n2:122_0: Araññaṁ pana vinayapariyāye tāva ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca sabbametaṁ arañña’’nti
anya-e0101n2:122_1: (pārā. 92) vuttaṁ. Abhidhammapariyāye ‘‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṁ arañña’’nti
anya-e0101n2:122_2: (vibha. 529) vuttaṁ. Imasmiṁ pana suttantikapariyāye ‘‘āraññakaṁ nāma senāsanaṁ pañcadhanusatikaṁ
anya-e0101n2:122_3: pacchima’’nti idaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ. Taṁ āropitena ācariyadhanunā parikkhittassa gāmassa
anya-e0101n2:122_4: indakhīlato aparikkhittassa paṭhamaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāya yāva vihāraparikkhepā minitvā vavatthapetabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:123_0: Sace pana vihāro aparikkhitto hoti, yaṁ sabbapaṭhamaṁ senāsanaṁ vā bhattasālā vā
anya-e0101n2:123_1: dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṁ vā bodhi vā cetiyaṁ vā dūre cepi senāsanato hoti, taṁ paricchedaṁ
anya-e0101n2:123_2: katvā minitabbanti vinayaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ. Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana vihārassapi
anya-e0101n2:123_3: gāmasseva upacāraṁ nīharitvā ubhinnaṁ leḍḍupātānaṁ antarā minitabbanti vuttaṁ. Idamettha pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:124_0: Sacepi āsanne gāmo hoti, vihāre ṭhitehi mānusakānaṁ saddo suyyati, pabbatanadīādīhi
anya-e0101n2:124_1: pana antaritattā na sakkā ujuṁ gantuṁ. Yo tassa pakatimaggo hoti, sacepi nāvāya sañcaritabbo,
anya-e0101n2:124_2: tena maggena pañcadhanusatikaṁ gahetabbaṁ. Yo pana āsannagāmassa aṅgasampādanatthaṁ
anya-e0101n2:124_3: tato tato maggaṁ pidahati, ayaṁ dhutaṅgacoro hoti.
anya-e0101n2:125_0: Sace pana āraññikassa bhikkhuno upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā gilāno hoti, tena araññe
anya-e0101n2:125_1: sappāyaṁ alabhantena gāmantasenāsanaṁ netvā upaṭṭhātabbo. Kālasseva pana nikkhamitvā
anya-e0101n2:125_2: aṅgayuttaṭṭhāne aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpetabbaṁ. Sace aruṇuṭṭhānavelāyaṁ tesaṁ ābādho vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0101n2:125_3: tesaṁyeva kiccaṁ kātabbaṁ. Na dhutaṅgasuddhikena bhavitabbanti idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:126: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhena sabbakālaṁ araññe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpetabbaṁ. Majjhimo cattāro vassike māse gāmante vasituṁ labhati. Muduko hemantikepi.
anya-e0101n2:127_0: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi yathā paricchinne kāle araññato āgantvā gāmantasenāsane dhammassavanaṁ
anya-e0101n2:127_1: suṇantānaṁ aruṇe uṭṭhitepi dhutaṅgaṁ na bhijjati. Sutvā gacchantānaṁ antarāmagge
anya-e0101n2:127_2: uṭṭhitepi na bhijjati. Sace pana uṭṭhitepi dhammakathike muhuttaṁ nipajjitvā gamissāmāti
anya-e0101n2:127_3: niddāyantānaṁ aruṇaṁ uṭṭhahati, attano vā ruciyā gāmantasenāsane aruṇaṁ uṭṭhapenti,
anya-e0101n2:128_0: Ayaṁpanānisaṁso, āraññiko bhikkhu araññasaññaṁ manasikaronto bhabbo aladdhaṁ vā samādhiṁ
anya-e0101n2:128_1: paṭiladdhuṁ laddhaṁ vā rakkhituṁ, satthāpissa attamano hoti. Yathāha – ‘‘tenāhaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:128_2: nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārenā’’ti (a. ni. 6.42; 8.86). Pantasenāsanavāsino
anya-e0101n2:128_3: cassa asappāyarūpādayo cittaṁ na vikkhipanti, vigatasantāso hoti, jīvitanikantiṁ
anya-e0101n2:128_4: jahati, pavivekasukharasaṁ assādeti, paṁsukūlikādibhāvopi cassa patirūpo hotīti.
anya-e0101n2:131: Eko araññe nivasaṁ, yaṁ sukhaṁ labhate yati;
anya-e0101n2:132: Rasaṁ tassa na vindanti, api devā saindakā.
anya-e0101n2:139: 32.Rukkhamūlikaṅgampi ‘‘channaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, rukkhamūlikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:140_0: Tena pana rukkhamūlikena sīmantarikarukkhaṁ, cetiyarukkhaṁ, niyyāsarukkhaṁ, phalarukkhaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:140_1: vaggulirukkhaṁ, susirarukkhaṁ, vihāramajjhe ṭhitarukkhanti ime rukkhe vivajjetvā
anya-e0101n2:141_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho yathārucitaṁ rukkhaṁ gahetvā
anya-e0101n2:141_1: paṭijaggāpetuṁ na labhati. Pādena paṇṇasaṭaṁ apanetvā vasitabbaṁ. Majjhimo taṁ ṭhānaṁ
anya-e0101n2:141_2: sampattehiyeva paṭijaggāpetuṁ labhati. Mudukena ārāmikasamaṇuddese pakkositvā sodhāpetvā
anya-e0101n2:141_3: samaṁ kārāpetvā vālukaṁ okirāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṁ kārāpetvā dvāraṁ yojāpetvā vasitabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:141_4: Mahadivase pana rukkhamūlikena tattha anisīditvā aññattha paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:142: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi channe vāsaṁ kappitakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Jānitvā channe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpitamatteti aṅguttarabhāṇakā. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:143_0: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, rukkhamūlasenāsanaṁ nissāya pabbajjāti (mahāva. 128) vacanato nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvo,
anya-e0101n2:143_1: appāni ceva sulabhāni ca tāni ca anavajjānīti (a. ni. 4.27; itivu. 101) bhagavatā
anya-e0101n2:143_3: senāsanamaccherakammārāmatānaṁ abhāvo, devatāhi sahavāsitā, appicchatādīnaṁ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n2:154: 33.Abbhokāsikaṅgampi ‘‘channañca rukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmi, abbhokāsikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:155_0: Tassa pana abbhokāsikassa dhammassavanāya vā uposathatthāya vā uposathāgāraṁ pavisituṁ
anya-e0101n2:155_1: vaṭṭati. Sace paviṭṭhassa devo vassati, deve vassamāne anikkhamitvā vassūparame nikkhamitabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:155_2: Bhojanasālaṁ vā aggisālaṁ vā pavisitvā vattaṁ kātuṁ, bhojanasālāya there bhikkhū
anya-e0101n2:155_3: bhattena āpucchituṁ, uddisantena vā uddisāpentena vā channaṁ pavisituṁ, bahi dunnikkhittāni
anya-e0101n2:155_4: mañcapīṭhādīni anto pavesetuñca vaṭṭati. Sace maggaṁ gacchantena vuḍḍhatarānaṁ parikkhāro
anya-e0101n2:155_5: gahito hoti, deve vassante maggamajjhe ṭhitaṁ sālaṁ pavisituṁ vaṭṭati. Sace na kiñci
anya-e0101n2:155_6: gahitaṁ hoti, sālāya ṭhassāmīti vegena gantuṁ na vaṭṭati. Pakatigatiyā gantvā paviṭṭhena
anya-e0101n2:155_7: pana yāva vassūparamā ṭhatvā gantabbanti idamassa vidhānaṁ. Rukkhamūlikassāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0101n2:156_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa rukkhaṁ vā pabbataṁ vā gehaṁ
anya-e0101n2:156_1: vā upanissāya vasituṁ na vaṭṭati. Abbhokāseyeva cīvarakuṭiṁ katvā vasitabbaṁ. Majjhimassa
anya-e0101n2:156_2: rukkhapabbatagehāni upanissāya anto appavisitvā vasituṁ vaṭṭati. Mudukassa acchannamariyādaṁ
anya-e0101n2:156_3: pabbhārampi sākhāmaṇḍapopi pīṭhapaṭopi khettarakkhakādīhi chaḍḍitā tatraṭṭhakakuṭikāpi vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0101n2:157: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi vāsatthāya channaṁ vā rukkhamūlaṁ vā paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Jānitvā tattha aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpitamatteti aṅguttarabhāṇakā. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:158_0: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, āvāsapalibodhupacchedo, thinamiddhapanūdanaṁ, ‘‘migā viya asaṅgacārino,
anya-e0101n2:158_1: aniketā viharanti bhikkhavo’’ti (saṁ. ni. 1.224) pasaṁsāya anurūpatā, nissaṅgatā,
anya-e0101n2:164: Yasmā tasmā hi sappañño, abbhokāsarato siyāti.
anya-e0101n2:167: 34.Sosānikaṅgampi ‘‘na susānaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, sosānikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:168_0: Tena pana sosānikena yaṁ manussā gāmaṁ nivesantā ‘‘idaṁ susāna’’nti vavatthapenti,
anya-e0101n2:168_1: na tattha vasitabbaṁ. Na hi matasarīre ajjhāpite taṁ susānaṁ nāma hoti, jhāpitakālato
anya-e0101n2:168_2: pana paṭṭhāya sacepi dvādasavassāni chaḍḍitaṁ, taṁ susānameva.
anya-e0101n2:169_0: Tasmiṁ pana vasantena caṅkamamaṇḍapādīni kāretvā mañcapīṭhaṁ paññapetvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṁ
anya-e0101n2:169_1: upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammaṁ vācentena na vasitabbaṁ. Garukaṁ hi idaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ, tasmā uppannaparissayavighātatthāya
anya-e0101n2:169_2: saṅghattheraṁ vā rājayuttakaṁ vā jānāpetvā appamattena vasitabbaṁ. Caṅkamantena addhakkhikena
anya-e0101n2:170_0: Susānaṁ gacchantenāpi mahāpathā ukkamma uppathamaggena gantabbaṁ. Divāyeva ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0101n2:170_1: vavatthapetabbaṁ. Evañhissa taṁ rattiṁ bhayānakaṁ na bhavissati, amanussā rattiṁ
anya-e0101n2:170_2: viravitvā viravitvā āhiṇḍantāpi na kenaci paharitabbā. Ekadivasampi susānaṁ agantuṁ
anya-e0101n2:170_3: na vaṭṭati. Majjhimayāmaṁ susāne khepetvā pacchimayāme paṭikkamituṁ vaṭṭatīti aṅguttarabhāṇakā.
anya-e0101n2:170_5: sevitabbaṁ. Kulagehaṁ na pavisitabbanti idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:171_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhena yattha dhuvaḍāhadhuvakuṇapadhuvarodanāni
anya-e0101n2:171_1: atthi, tattheva vasitabbaṁ. Majjhimassa tīsu ekasmimpi sati vaṭṭati. Mudukassa vuttanayena
anya-e0101n2:172: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi na susānamhi vāsaṁ kappanena dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Susānaṁ agatadivaseti aṅguttarabhāṇakā. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:173_0: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso maraṇassatipaṭilābho, appamādavihāritā, asubhanimittādhigamo, kāmarāgavinodanaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:184: 35.Yathāsanthatikaṅgampi ‘‘senāsanaloluppaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, yathāsanthatikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:185: Tena pana yathāsanthatikena yadassa senāsanaṁ ‘‘idaṁ tuyhaṁ pāpuṇātī’’ti gāhitaṁ hoti, teneva tuṭṭhabbaṁ, na añño uṭṭhāpetabbo. Idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:186_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho attano pattasenāsanaṁ dūreti
anya-e0101n2:186_1: vā accāsanneti vā amanussadīghajātikādīhi upaddutanti vā uṇhanti vā sītalanti vā
anya-e0101n2:186_2: pucchituṁ na labhati. Majjhimo pucchituṁ labhati. Gantvā pana oloketuṁ na labhati.
anya-e0101n2:186_3: Muduko gantvā oloketvā sacassa taṁ na ruccati, aññaṁ gahetuṁ labhati.
anya-e0101n2:187: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi senāsanaloluppe uppannamatte dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjatīti ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:188_0: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, ‘‘yaṁ laddhaṁ tena tuṭṭhabba’’nti (jā. 1.1.136; pāci. 793) vuttovādakaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:189: Yaṁ laddhaṁ tena santuṭṭho, yathāsanthatiko yati;
anya-e0101n2:191: Na so rajjati seṭṭhamhi, hīnaṁ laddhā na kuppati;
anya-e0101n2:197: 36.Nesajjikaṅgampi ‘‘seyyaṁ paṭikkhipāmi, nesajjikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī’’ti imesaṁ aññataravacanena samādinnaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n2:198: Tena pana nesajjikena rattiyā tīsu yāmesu ekaṁ yāmaṁ uṭṭhāya caṅkamitabbaṁ. Iriyāpathesu hi nipajjitumeva na vaṭṭati. Idamassa vidhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:199_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa neva apassenaṁ, na dussapallatthikā,
anya-e0101n2:199_1: na āyogapaṭṭo vaṭṭati. Majjhimassa imesu tīsu yaṁkiñci vaṭṭati. Mudukassa apassenampi
anya-e0101n2:199_2: dussapallatthikāpi āyogapaṭṭopi bibbohanampi pañcaṅgopi sattaṅgopi vaṭṭati. Pañcaṅgo
anya-e0101n2:199_3: pana piṭṭhiapassayena saddhiṁ kato. Sattaṅgo nāma piṭṭhiapassayena ca ubhatopassesu
anya-e0101n2:199_4: apassayehi ca saddhiṁ kato. Taṁ kira miḷābhayattherassa akaṁsu. Thero anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyi.
anya-e0101n2:200: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi seyyaṁ kappitamatte dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n2:201_0: Ayaṁ panānisaṁso, ‘‘seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharatī’’ti (dī.
anya-e0101n2:201_1: ni. 3.320; ma. ni. 1.186) vuttassa cetaso vinibandhassa upacchedanaṁ, sabbakammaṭṭhānānuyogasappāyatā,
anya-e0101n2:214: Tattha kusalattikatoti sabbāneva hi dhutaṅgāni sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṁ vasena siyā kusalāni, siyā abyākatāni, natthi dhutaṅgaṁ akusalanti.
anya-e0101n2:215_0: Yo pana vadeyya ‘‘pāpiccho icchāpakato āraññiko hotīti ādivacanato (a. ni. 5.181;
anya-e0101n2:215_1: pari. 325) akusalampi dhutaṅga’’nti. So vattabbo – na mayaṁ ‘‘akusalacittena araññe
anya-e0101n2:215_2: na vasatī’’ti vadāma. Yassa hi araññe nivāso, so āraññiko. So ca pāpiccho vā bhaveyya
anya-e0101n2:215_3: appiccho vā. Imāni pana tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
anya-e0101n2:215_4: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṁ ñāṇaṁ aṅgametesanti dhutaṅgāni. Atha vā
anya-e0101n2:215_5: dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgānīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:215_6: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti, yassetāni aṅgāni bhaveyyuṁ, na ca akusalaṁ
anya-e0101n2:215_7: kiñci dhunāti, yesaṁ taṁ aṅgantikatvā dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṁ. Nāpi akusalaṁ cīvaraloluppādīni
anya-e0101n2:215_8: ceva niddhunāti paṭipattiyā ca aṅgaṁ hoti. Tasmā suvuttamidaṁ ‘‘natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga’’nti.
anya-e0101n2:216_0: ‘‘Yesampi kusalattikavinimuttaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ, tesaṁ atthato dhutaṅgameva natthi. Asantaṁ
anya-e0101n2:216_1: kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṁ nāma bhavissati. Dhutaguṇe samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi
anya-e0101n2:216_2: ca nesaṁ āpajjati, tasmā taṁ na gahetabba’’nti ayaṁ tāva kusalattikato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n2:217: Dhutādīnaṁvibhāgatoti dhuto veditabbo. Dhutavādo veditabbo. Dhutadhammā veditabbā. Dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni. Kassa dhutaṅgasevanā sappāyāti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n2:218: Tattha dhutoti dhutakileso vā puggalo kilesadhunano vā dhammo.
anya-e0101n2:219: Dhutavādoti ettha pana atthi dhuto na dhutavādo, atthi na dhuto dhutavādo, atthi neva dhuto na dhutavādo, atthi dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca.
anya-e0101n2:220_0: Tattha yo dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni, paraṁ pana dhutaṅgena na ovadati, nānusāsati
anya-e0101n2:220_1: bākulatthero viya, ayaṁ dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha, ‘‘tayidaṁ āyasmā bākulo dhuto
anya-e0101n2:220_2: na dhutavādo’’ti. Yo pana na dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni, kevalaṁ aññe dhutaṅgena
anya-e0101n2:220_3: ovadati anusāsati upanandatthero viya, ayaṁ na dhuto dhutavādo. Yathāha, ‘‘tayidaṁ
anya-e0101n2:220_4: āyasmā upanando sakyaputto na dhuto dhutavādo’’ti. Yo ubhayavipanno lāḷudāyī viya,
anya-e0101n2:220_5: ayaṁ neva dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha, ‘‘tayidaṁ āyasmā lāḷudāyī neva dhuto na dhutavādo’’ti.
anya-e0101n2:220_6: Yo pana ubhayasampanno dhammasenāpati viya, ayaṁ dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n2:220_7: ‘‘tayidaṁ āyasmā sāriputto dhuto ceva dhutavādo cāti.
anya-e0101n2:221_0: Dhutadhammā veditabbāti appicchatā, santuṭṭhitā, sallekhatā, pavivekatā, idamatthitāti
anya-e0101n2:221_1: ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārakā pañca dhammā ‘‘appicchataṁyeva nissāyā’’tiādivacanato
anya-e0101n2:221_2: (a. ni. 5.181; pari. 325) dhutadhammā nāma, tattha appicchatā ca santuṭṭhitā ca alobho.
anya-e0101n2:221_3: Sallekhatā ca pavivekatā ca dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti alobhe ca amohe ca. Idamatthitā
anya-e0101n2:221_4: ñāṇameva. Tattha ca alobhena paṭikkhepavatthūsu lobhaṁ, amohena tesveva ādīnavapaṭicchādakaṁ
anya-e0101n2:221_5: mohaṁ dhunāti. Alobhena ca anuññātānaṁ paṭisevanamukhena pavattaṁ kāmasukhānuyogaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:221_6: amohena dhutaṅgesu atisallekhamukhena pavattaṁ attakilamathānuyogaṁ dhunāti. Tasmā
anya-e0101n2:222: Dhutaṅgāni veditabbānīti terasa dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni paṁsukūlikaṅgaṁ…pe… nesajjikaṅganti. Tāni atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vuttāneva.
anya-e0101n2:223_0: Kassa dhutaṅgasevanā sappāyāti rāgacaritassa ceva mohacaritassa ca. Kasmā? Dhutaṅgasevanā
anya-e0101n2:223_1: hi dukkhāpaṭipadā ceva sallekhavihāro ca. Dukkhāpaṭipadañca nissāya rāgo vūpasammati.
anya-e0101n2:223_2: Sallekhaṁ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyati. Āraññikaṅgarukkhamūlikaṅgapaṭisevanā
anya-e0101n2:223_3: vā ettha dosacaritassāpi sappāyā. Tattha hissa asaṅghaṭṭiyamānassa viharato dosopi
anya-e0101n2:224_0: Samāsabyāsatoti imāni pana dhutaṅgāni samāsato tīṇi sīsaṅgāni, pañca asambhinnaṅgānīti
anya-e0101n2:224_1: aṭṭheva honti. Tattha sapadānacārikaṅgaṁ, ekāsanikaṅgaṁ, abbhokāsikaṅganti imāni
anya-e0101n2:224_2: tīṇi sīsaṅgāni. Sapadānacārikaṅgañhi rakkhanto piṇḍapātikaṅgampi rakkhissati. Ekāsanikaṅgañca
anya-e0101n2:224_4: rakkhantassa kiṁ atthi rukkhamūlikaṅgayathāsanthatikaṅgesu rakkhitabbaṁ nāma. Iti
anya-e0101n2:224_5: imāni tīṇi sīsaṅgāni, āraññikaṅgaṁ, paṁsukūlikaṅgaṁ, tecīvarikaṅgaṁ, nesajjikaṅgaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:224_6: sosānikaṅganti imāni pañca asambhinnaṅgāni cāti aṭṭheva honti.
anya-e0101n2:225_0: Puna dve cīvarapaṭisaṁyuttāni, pañca piṇḍapātapaṭisaṁyuttāni, pañca senāsanapaṭisaṁyuttāni,
anya-e0101n2:225_1: ekaṁ vīriyapaṭisaṁyuttanti evaṁ cattārova honti. Tattha nesajjikaṅgaṁ vīriyapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ. Itarāni pākaṭāneva.
anya-e0101n2:226_0: Puna sabbāneva nissayavasena dve honti paccayanissitāni dvādasa, vīriyanissitaṁ ekanti.
anya-e0101n2:226_1: Sevitabbāsevitabbavasenapi dveyeva honti. Yassa hi dhutaṅgaṁ sevantassa kammaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0101n2:226_2: vaḍḍhati, tena sevitabbāni. Yassa sevato hāyati, tena na sevitabbāni. Yassa pana
anya-e0101n2:226_3: sevatopi asevatopi vaḍḍhateva, na hāyati, tenāpi pacchimaṁ janataṁ anukampantena
anya-e0101n2:226_4: sevitabbāni. Yassāpi sevatopi asevatopi na vaḍḍhati, tenāpi sevitabbāniyeva āyatiṁ vāsanatthāyāti.
anya-e0101n2:227_0: Evaṁ sevitabbāsevitabbavasena duvidhānipi sabbāneva cetanāvasena ekavidhāni honti.
anya-e0101n2:227_1: Ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṁ samādānacetanāti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṁ ‘‘yā cetanā, taṁ dhutaṅganti vadantī’’ti.
anya-e0101n2:228_0: Byāsato pana bhikkhūnaṁ terasa, bhikkhunīnaṁ aṭṭha, sāmaṇerānaṁ dvādasa, sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṁ
anya-e0101n2:228_1: satta, upāsakaupāsikānaṁ dveti dvācattālīsa honti. Sace pana abbhokāse āraññikaṅgasampannaṁ
anya-e0101n2:228_2: susānaṁ hoti, ekopi bhikkhu ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṁ sakkoti. Bhikkhunīnaṁ
anya-e0101n2:228_3: pana āraññikaṅgaṁ khalupacchābhattikaṅgañca dvepi sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittāni, abbhokāsikaṅgaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:228_4: rukkhamūlikaṅgaṁ, sosānikaṅganti imāni tīṇi dupparihārāni. Bhikkhuniyā hi dutiyikaṁ
anya-e0101n2:228_5: vinā vasituṁ na vaṭṭati. Evarūpe ca ṭhāne samānacchandā dutiyikā dullabhā. Sacepi
anya-e0101n2:228_6: labheyya saṁsaṭṭhavihārato na mucceyya. Evaṁ sati yassatthāya dhutaṅgaṁ seveyya,
anya-e0101n2:228_7: svevassā attho na sampajjeyya. Evaṁ paribhuñjituṁ asakkuṇeyyatāya pañca hāpetvā bhikkhunīnaṁ
anya-e0101n2:228_8: aṭṭheva hontīti veditabbāni. Yathāvuttesu pana ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṁ sesāni dvādasa
anya-e0101n2:228_9: sāmaṇerānaṁ, satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṁ veditabbāni. Upāsakaupāsikānaṁ pana ekāsanikaṅgaṁ,
anya-e0101n2:228_10: pattapiṇḍikaṅganti imāni dve patirūpāni ceva sakkā ca paribhuñjitunti dve dhutaṅgānīti
anya-e0101n2:228_11: evaṁ byāsato dvecattālīsa hontīti ayaṁ samāsabyāsato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n2:229_0: Ettāvatā ca ‘‘sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño’’ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena
anya-e0101n2:229_1: desite visuddhimagge yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa
anya-e0101n2:229_2: vodānaṁ hoti, tesaṁ sampādanatthaṁ samādātabbadhutaṅgakathā bhāsitā hoti.
